title: Apple Q4 2024 Earnings Beat Expectations with Strong Services Growth
summary: Apple reports record Q4 earnings with Services segment driving growth. iPhone sales remain stable while Services reach new all-time highs.

title: Goldman Sachs Raises Apple Price Target to $250 on Services Momentum
summary: Analyst upgrade reflects confidence in Services segment expansion and margin improvements. Maintains positive outlook on AI opportunities.

title: Apple Faces New Regulatory Scrutiny in EU Over App Store Practices
summary: European Commission opens new investigation into Apple's App Store policies. Potential impact on revenue model still being assessed.

title: iPhone 16 Demand Accelerates in Early Sales Figures
summary: Preliminary data suggests strong iPhone 16 demand, particularly for Pro models. Supply chain reports indicate healthy order flow.

title: Apple Intelligence Features Roll Out to iPhone Users
summary: New AI-powered features begin rolling out globally. Users report improved productivity features and better device integration.
